A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst Star Wars movie since Attack of the Clones.  I know that sounds harsh\, but it's true.   It was two and a half hours of plot holes\, poor acting\, and ridiculous premises.  Topped off with turning a cherished childhood hero\, Luke Skywalker\,  into a character of the uncle no one wants to invite to Christmas dinner any more.\n\nThe Last Jedi was utter and COMPLETE garbage.
